tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_products (
  product_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  product_type VARCHAR(50),
  inception_date DATE,
  manager_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_type VARCHAR(50),
    issuer VARCHAR(100),
    inception_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE comparison_evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product1_id INT,
    product2_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    comparison_result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    performance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE performances (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(product_id) NOT NULL,
    category_id UUID REFERENCES categories(category_id) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    performance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    date DATE,
    value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (id, product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Comparison (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_1_id INT,
    product_2_id INT,
    comparison_date DATE,
    result VARCHAR(100)
);
